con:testCase.name: Goodcase-DEV-redeemVoucher-BrandRights-US-427
con:testCase.con:description:
DRC-427 Description:
Bitte SoapUI-Voucher-Tests anpassen bzw. ergenzen im Kontext der Story DRC-426
isServiceProviderAllowedToUseChannel() (Alle SP sind auf den voucherredemption Channel erlaubt) isServiceProviderAllowedForPartner() MCE, darf alle SPs PPIT, darf nur:LO/SP901, BL/SP902, SP904, SP905, SP906, SP907, SP908, SP909, SP910, SP911, SP912, SP913 SPAIN, darf nur: SP501, SP502, SP503, SP504, SP601, SP602, SP603, SP604, SP605, SP606, SP607, SP608, SP609, SP610, SP611, SP612, SP613, SP614, SP615, SP901, SP902, SP903 checkIsPartnerAllowedToUseChannel() PPIT/ SPAIN / MCE d√ºrfen den Voucher VoucherRedemptionEvolutionService aufrufen. "SPAIN" = "U-323" "MCE" = "U-941" "PPIT"= "U-461"

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:RedeemVoucherResponse xmlns:ns2="http://soap.types.soa.voucherredemption.service.directrecharge.o2.com"> <result> <success>false</success> <resultCode>1003</resultCode> <resultMessage>ServiceProvider is not allowed for the voucherredemtion channel</resultMessage> </result> </ns2:RedeemVoucherResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:RedeemVoucherResponse xmlns:ns2="http://soap.types.soa.voucherredemption.service.directrecharge.o2.com"> <result> <success>false</success> <resultCode>1003</resultCode> <resultMessage>ServiceProvider is not allowed for the voucherredemtion channel</resultMessage> </result> </ns2:RedeemVoucherResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
